verses.name: Numbers 12:1
verses.text: And Miriam and Aaron spake against Moses because of the Ethiopian woman whom he had married: for he had married an Ethiopian woman.

verses.name: Numbers 12:2
verses.text: And they said, Hath the Lord indeed spoken only by Moses? hath he not spoken also by us? And the Lord heard it.

verses.name: Numbers 12:3
verses.text: (Now the man Moses was very meek, above all the men which were upon the face of the earth.)

verses.name: Numbers 12:4
verses.text: And the Lord spake suddenly unto Moses, and unto Aaron, and unto Miriam, Come out ye three unto the tabernacle of the congregation. And they three came out.
